bike.description: D6 high modulus carbon w/ aero shaped tubes, internal cable routing, extended seat tube, integrated alloy cupped head tube, double water bottle mounts
sizes: XS/S (48cm), S (50cm), S/M (52cm), M (54cm), M/L (56cm), L (58cm), XL (60cm)

components.description: D6 high modulus carbon aero stays w/ brake cavity design, cold forged dropout w/ replaceable hanger
FC-440 carbon aero monocoque w/ 1 1/8" carbon steerer w/ internal routing
Shimano Dura Ace TT bar end, 20-speed
Oval 978 carbon rims w/ alloy braking surface, 78mm rims, straight pull DT Swiss aero-spokes 16/20H, sealed bearing hubs
Tektro T-925 Tri w/ cartridge pads
Profile SVET carbon base bar, Profile T2 Plus Cobra carbon extensions
Selle Italia T1 w/ FeC alloy rails
